metadata.title: CVE-2024-57857 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/siw: Remove direct link to net_deviceDo not manage a per device direct link to net_device. Relyon associated ib_devices net_device management, not doublingthe effort locally. A badly managed local link to net_devicewas causing a 'KASAN: slab-use-after-free' exception duringsiw_query_port() call.
